data.lyric:
[ti:Moonlight]
[ar:lil milk]
[al:说唱听我的 第2期]
[by:zhaoxin_karakal]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Moonlight (Live) - lil milk

[00:02.92]曲：Lil milk
[00:04.38]编曲：Timothy Infinite
[00:05.84]音乐总监：Mai "No Label Crew"
[00:07.31]混音/母带：Provoke
[00:08.77]执行监制：隆历奇 "No Label Crew"/王朝1982
[00:10.23]你的笑容像是我昨晚的moonlight
[00:12.95]你想做什么就做什么it's alright
[00:15.80]如果记不清楚我来陪你go back
[00:18.16]Just do wanna do n do wanna do
[00:20.85]你的笑容像是我昨晚的moonlight
[00:23.49]你想做什么就做什么it's alright
[00:26.14]如果记不清楚我来陪你go back
[00:28.81]Just do wanna do n do wanna do
[00:31.75]
[00:32.27]Stay there不要急 等我过来
[00:34.78]哦你的爱像礼物 babe 一样拆不开
[00:37.54]我喜欢把柠檬放在你的窗台
[00:39.99]你说过的话像是今天电影旁白
[00:42.75]OK baby please don't go
[00:45.00]I trying to say for get more close
[00:47.79]Hey when you go
[00:49.02]I don't know why I so sad for you
[00:52.19]Even you don't feel my feel
[00:54.83]可是我还不能说我太累
[00:57.51]哦I drink I say
[00:59.13]你那天很美
[01:00.99]像梦里见过太多遍like dejavu
[01:05.17]
[01:06.44]Cause I don't really want really want
[01:09.17]
